name: hbng
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(w1))), wi(w1, wal(s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w0))), wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(w1))))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w0))), wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(w1))))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w0))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w0))), wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w0))

comment: A more general form of ~ hbn . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2010.)
